headline.main: Cruz, Rubio Say Iran Prisoner Swap a 'Dangerous Precedent'
headline.print_headline: Cruz, Rubio Say Iran Prisoner Swap a 'Dangerous Precedent'

docs.snippet: Republican presidential candidates Ted Cruz and Marco Rubio praised Iran's release of five detained Americans on Sunday, but sharply criticized the deal the White House made to win their freedom saying it would lead to more Americans being taken "...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidates Ted Cruz and Marco Rubio praised Iran's release of five detained Americans on Sunday, but sharply criticized the deal the White House made to win their freedom saying it would lead to more Americans being taken "hostage."

headline.main: Tata Steel to Cut 1,050 Jobs in Britain-Sky News
headline.print_headline: Tata Steel to Cut 1,050 Jobs in Britain-Sky News

docs.lead_paragraph: Tata Steel, the biggest steelmaker in Britain, will axe 1,050 jobs in the country, Sky News reported on Sunday, on top of the 1,170 cuts it announced last year due to low steel prices.

headline.main: World Health Organization Hopes to Eradicate Polio in 2016

docs.lead_paragraph: An official says the World Health Organization hopes to eradicate polio in 2016, after containing outbreaks in conflict-ridden Syria, Iraq and Somalia by immunizing millions of children over two years.
